snippet.title: The Land of Eyas trailer
snippet.description:
The Land of Eyas tells the tale of young boy with no memories, lost in an enchanted realm of two opposing gravity forces. Players must make use of the unique gravity-based platform mechanics to explore the world, traverse through the escalating dangers he encounters along his journey, and help him find the way home. 

Developed by the indie developer Happy Square Productions, The Land of Eyas will be available on July 21 on Steam and selected digital retailers.
